name: Astro (itch) (Eckdijital)
description:
A modest endless Asteroids like shooter game I developed to practice programming of views, camera movement and scrolling. Longer you play harder it gets...Unpack zip and ready to play. Controls:

Thrust = W ///// Shoot = MOUSE LEFT ///// Bomb = SPACE or MOUSE RIGHT

Sprites: https://gamesupply.itch.io/green-miniships-free

Backgrounds: https://www.youtube.com/c/FriendlyCosmonaut/featured
